description: Full understanding & experience in creating MEAN or MERN stack web apps.Good understanding of front-end technologies, such as JavaScript, HTML5 and CSS3.
Understanding of REST, AJAX, JSON, XML and JWT.

Good understanding of NodeJS for backend and ability to create simple but good user interfaces with HTML, CSS, Bootstrap and JavaScript, JQuery, Angular/React.Familiarity with SQL/NoSQL (PostgreSQL, MySQL, MongoDB) databases and their declarative query languages.
Having some understanding of 3D modelling, graphics, and visualization is a big plus.
Understanding of publisher and subscriber(pub/sub) based communication.
Understanding of microservices, Unit Testing, and AWS/GCP is a plus.
Experience managing full-stack, multi-language, multi-framework software development.
Strong logical thinking; proactive, open-minded and learning attitude.
